lead_paragraph: The Republican presidential contenders spent Friday in their final sprint around Iowa, and most of them took the opportunity to lob more attacks at Mr. Cruz.

byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro contributed reporting from Muscatine, Iowa; Matt Flegenheimer from Fenton, Iowa; and Alexander Burns from Nashua, N.H.
byline.original: By JEREMY W. PETERS and JONATHAN MARTIN

headline.print_headline: Rivals Band Together Against Cruz After Debate
headline.main: Ted Cruz Endures More Hits From Rivals After Tough Debate

snippet: The Republican presidential contenders spent Friday in their final sprint around Iowa, and most of them took the opportunity to lob more attacks at Mr. Cruz.
abstract: Entire Republican presidential field criticizes Sen Ted Cruz in run up to Iowa caucuses, attempting to diminish his lead, even as Cruz shifts from attacking Donald J Trump to attacking Sen Marco Rubio, who is quickly gaining on Cruz.
